title: Phytostan | Integrative Therapeutics®
description: Supports healthy intestinal function and optimum GI ecology.*
cleaned_text: full details](/products/phytostan) Product information UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR INTESTINAL SUPPORT* Unique combination of ingredients for intestinal support.* Phytostan is designed to support healthy intestinal function.* To do this, Phytostan combines caprylic acid, undecylenic acid with Pau D'Arco and other key botanical extracts. UNIQUE COMBINATION FOR INTESTINAL SUPPORT* Unique combination of ingredients for intestinal support.* Phytostan is designed to support healthy intestinal function.* To do this, Phytostan combines caprylic acid, undecylenic acid with Pau D'Arco and other key botanical extracts. INGREDIENTS 150mcg Vitamin A (as beta carotene with mixed carotenoids) 52mg Calcium (as calcium undecylenate, calcium 0.3mg Zinc (as zygis) Aerial Parts Extract ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients Phytostan Does Not Contain Wheat Gluten Dairy Colors Preservatives Other UPC: 871791001848 SKU: 146009 DIRECTIONS Phytostan Directions and/or DosageAdults take 1 capsule three times daily between meals, or as recommended by your healthcare professional. If you experience nausea when using this product, take with a small amount of food. WarningDo not use this product if you are pregnant or nursing. If you are taking prescription drugs, consult your healthcare professional prior to use. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight.
